Scene:
The Daianji River Bank
(Daianji tsutsumi / 大安寺堤)

Play: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags (敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

Production: February 1991



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Sumitayū VII (see also Takemoto Mojitayū IX) (竹本住大夫 (七))

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Enza V (鶴澤燕三 (五))

Tsuruzawa Hachisuke (鶴澤八介)



Performers:
